EnumProp.name: Shader
EnumProp.doc: Select the shader that should be used to render this material

StringProp.name: Second UV layer texture (if exists)
StringProp.doc: If UV map 2 is needed, enter its texture name here

StringProp.name: Mask image (optional)
StringProp.doc: Greyscale image containing the alpha channel (transparency) for this image

BoolProp.name: Colorizable (for library objects and karts)
BoolProp.doc: Used to determine whether this texture can be colorized by STK (for library objects and karts)

FloatProp.name: Colorization factor
FloatProp.doc: Set the minimun resulting saturation of the new color, 0 means using the original saturation from texture

StringProp.name: Colorization mask
StringProp.doc: Determine which part of texture to be affected by colorization, this will be encoded into the alpha channel of texture, so don't use in transparent shader.

StringProp.name: Hue settings for colorization
StringProp.doc: Define list of hue for colorization, from 0.0 to (or equal) 1 (0.0 means original color), separated by spaces, STK will randomly pick one hue for colorization, no need to define for karts.

LabelProp.name: PBR Generic solid shader (most of the materials)

StringProp.name: PBR Data Map
StringProp.doc: Use PBR Data maps to store the roughness (red channel) the metalness (green channel) and the emissive (blue channel)

StringProp.name: Normal Map
StringProp.doc: Use normal maps for this material (the model must be exported as tangent for this to work)

BoolProp.name: Colorizable (for library objects and karts)
BoolProp.doc: Used to determine whether this texture can be colorized by STK (for library objects and karts)

FloatProp.name: Colorization factor
FloatProp.doc: Set the minimun resulting saturation of the new color, 0 means using the original saturation from texture

StringProp.name: Colorization mask
StringProp.doc: Determine which part of texture to be affected by colorization

StringProp.doc: Define list of hue for colorization, from 0.0 to (or equal) 1 (0.0 means original color), separated by spaces, STK will randomly pick one hue for colorization, no need to define for karts.

LabelProp.name: PBR Generic transparent shader for cutout alpha

StringProp.name: PBR Data Map
StringProp.doc: Use PBR Data maps to store the roughness (red channel) the metalness (green channel) and the emissive (blue channel)

BoolProp.name: Colorizable (for library objects and karts)
BoolProp.doc: Used to determine whether this texture can be colorized by STK (for library objects and karts)

StringProp.name: Hue settings for colorization
StringProp.doc: Define list of hue for colorization, from 0.0 to (or equal) 1 (0.0 means original color), separated by spaces, STK will randomly pick one hue for colorization, no need to define for karts.

StringProp.name: Mask image (optional)
StringProp.doc: Greyscale image containing the alpha channel (transparency) for this image

LabelProp.name: This material will ignore lights/shadows and always be at full brightness. Uses UV layer 0

EnumChoice.label: Vegetation
EnumChoice.doc: Shader that makes something wave as if under the wind, usually used for vegetation

LabelProp.name: Use vertex painting and paint in black the vertices that
should remain static. Other parts will wave in the wind.
Use tones of grey to make vertices move more softly.

BoolProp.name: Colorizable (for library objects and karts)
BoolProp.doc: Used to determine whether this texture can be colorized by STK (for library objects and karts)

StringProp.name: Hue settings for colorization
StringProp.doc: Define list of hue for colorization, from 0.0 to (or equal) 1 (0.0 means original color), separated by spaces, STK will randomly pick one hue for colorization, no need to define for karts.

EnumChoice.label: Splatting
EnumChoice.doc: Use splatting (multiple textures with smooth transitions)

EnumProp.name: Mirror in reversed races
EnumProp.doc: When the race is played in the opposite direction, indicates whether to flip this texture

BoolProp.name: Below shallow water
BoolProp.doc: Used for the terrain under shallow water where you can drive

BoolProp.name: Collision action
BoolProp.doc: What happens when the kart touches/hits this material in any way

EnumProp.name: Action
EnumProp.doc: How to react when kart touches this material

BoolProp.name: Enable Slowdow
BoolProp.doc: Whether to slow down the kart when driving on this material

FloatProp.name: Slowdown Time (seconds)
FloatProp.doc: Time it takes for speed to drop to its low point when driving here

FloatProp.name: Maximum Speed (fraction)
FloatProp.doc: Fraction of the maximum speed can be reached when driving here

BoolProp.name: Falling Effect
BoolProp.doc: Whether this material is the bottom of a pit (then camera will look down at kart falling when over it)

BoolProp.name: High tires adhesion
BoolProp.doc: If checked, karts will have good grip on this surface and not slip, even at angles

BoolProp.name: Affect gravity
BoolProp.doc: If checked, karts will be fall towards this surface like it was the ground, no matter its angle

BoolProp.name: Ignore (ghost material)
BoolProp.doc: Drive through this texture like it didn't exist (good for smoke, etc.)

BoolProp.name: Particle effect
BoolProp.doc: Whether to emit particles (e.g. smoke) when driving on this surface

StringProp.name: Particles file
StringProp.doc: Name of the XML file containing the description of particles to use on this terrain

BoolProp.name: Play sound effect
BoolProp.doc: Whether to play a sound when driving on this surface

FloatProp.name: Sound pitch at min speed
FloatProp.doc: Pitch of the sound when the kart is going slowly (1.0 is no change, < 1.0 is lower pitch, > 1.0 is higher pitch)

FloatProp.name: Sound pitch at max speed
FloatProp.doc: Pitch of the sound when the kart is going fastly (1.0 is no change, < 1.0 is lower pitch, > 1.0 is higher pitch)

BoolProp.name: Positional sound effect
BoolProp.doc: If true, the sound will get dimmer when far from camera, and with panning; if false, it's heard at centered pan and at full volume

FloatProp.name: Rolloff rate
FloatProp.doc: Speed at which the sound fades out as you stand further from the sound emitter

BoolProp.name: Reset kart (on drive)
BoolProp.doc: whether to rescue kart if it ends up [driving] on this surface

BoolProp.name: Water bottom
BoolProp.doc: whether this material is the bottom (seabed) of a water area (used to create a splash effect)

BoolProp.name: Water surface
BoolProp.doc: whether this material is the surface of a water area (used to create a splash effect)

BoolProp.name: Zipper (speed boost)
BoolProp.doc: Whether to get a speed boost when driving on this surface
